name: gotomedia
tagline: We do the thinking so your customers don’t have to
description: gotomedia is a strategic consultancy specializing in research, UX, and mobile design. We envision through contextual research; conceptualize and learn through iterative prototyping and testing. We design responsive, multi-device experiences that work simply & beautifully. We work with companies large and small, from established global leaders to startups. We're located in the heart of San Francisco in the historic Box Factory Warehouse, a renowned center for design and arts.
